page.title: 18Field Day in Ribchester.
page.content: Ribchester Field Day is held every June,it is run by a committee. There is a fancy dress parade with bands and morris dancers. It was a Silver Jubilee this year so there was a pram race,a tennis tournament,a treasure hunt,a western show,a clowns tea party,cricket match,photograph exhibiteon and a disco on the field. The first Field Day Queen was Jane Eccles in 1962 and this years Field Day Queen was Sarah Steady. On the field day there were pony rides,re- freshments,tombola,lucky dip,a greasy pole and a marquee with things like, cakes,flower arrangements,minature gar- dens,decorated clogs or shoes.There is a village market on the Spring Bank holiday Monday,when people make food to sell and the money goes to charities they want it to go to.
